txt.en: It's Always Spiders
Bring the satchel to Usham outside the Dampstone Inn
Place Usham's satchel down on the table outside the inn

'Far to the east of the city I ran afoul of... afoul of...'

Usham shudders.

'Do I have to say it? Spiders! Terrible things! In my haste to escape, I left my satchel behind. Will you go back there and retrieve it for me? And perhaps you will defeat some of the creatures that frightened me so?'
Talk to Usham outside the Dampstone Inn
'In my haste to escape, I left my satchel behind. Will you go back there and retrieve it for me? And perhaps you will defeat some of the creatures that frightened me so?'
Leave Usham's satchel in the wild north-east of the Dampstone Inn
'You rescued my satchel from the spiders? Thank you, friend. Can you set it down on that small table over there?'
Return to Usham outside the Dampstone Inn
'Can you set my satchel down on that small table over there?'

'There... there was a spider hiding in my satchel? It must have hitched a ride when I was travelling toward the city, and thought to surprise me when I least expected it! These creatures will stop at nothing to terrify me! I am lucky that I dropped the satchel when I did! Why did I ever send you to bring it back to me?'

You ask Usham what he would like done with his satchel now. He gazes at you in horror.

'Keep it? Are you mad? I do not want it anymore! Take it outside the city and leave it there!'
Talk to Maisha outside the Dampstone Inn
'Keep it? Are you mad? I do not want it anymore! Take it outside the city and leave it there!'
Defeated spiders east of the city ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Usham was frightened by spiders outside the city and has asked for your help.
Usham no longer wants his satchel, and has asked you to leave it outside the city. Just to the north-east of the Dampstone Inn should be far enough.

'Your friend is gone. He said he was going to sign up with one of the caravans and go with them to a land far from here, where spiders will no longer menace him.'

She grins at you.

'He left before I could tell him about any of the great beasts that I have heard live in and beyond the vast deserts... much worse than any of the spiders you find around here! Oh well. He will see.

'Good day to you.'
You pick up Usham's satchel and resolve to return it to him outside the Dampstone Inn
Usham ran afoul of spiders to the east of the city, and he asked for your help recovering the satchel he dropped here when he fled.
Now that you have done as he asked, you should return to Usham outside the Dampstone Inn.
Usham is outside the Dampstone Inn.
Maisha has called for your attention outside the Dampstone Inn.
Usham asked you to set his satchel down on the table outside the inn.
Usham is not happy.
Defeat spiders east of the city ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect Usham's satchel where he dropped it east of the city
You triumphed over the sneaky spider. That was a close one!
As you go to set it down, a sneaky spider leaps from the satchel!
You set down the satchel. Honestly, you cannot really blame Usham for this
Usham is gone, but a woman standing nearby calls for your attention
